discourse_list.title: Element Finance Airdrop for Gitcoin Repo Contributors

content.content: Hey  everyone, Element Finance airdropped their governance token, Gitcoinco repo is on the list of elegible ethereum ecosystem repositories. Checkout their post and follow their instructions, if you get things submitted before April 6th you should be able to claim in the first ecosystem drop.    mirror.xyz    Element DAO, ELFI Voting Distribution At Element Finance we believe that delivering on the true promise of decentralized finance doesn’t stop at the protocol. It requires a broad, decentralized community of thoughtful stewards as well. We’ve been working on the details of our governance...
